story:
Short Summary

The Bristol Skipchen is a voluntary run  community food waste campaign . We have been operating a pay-as-you-feel cafe serving only 'surplus' food for 8 months in Bristol, Stokes Croft.

In the last week of April we will be taking our food waste campaign on the road in our mobile kitchen Food Rescue Ambulance and show solidarity with Calais Migrant Camp. 

We will provide hot food from our food rescue ambulance, and drop off supplies of food and other much needed items.

We will operate a temporary outdoor kitchen aiming to serve 2 hot meals a day.

This is because  we believe EVERY human being has a right to food, shelter and a life free from violence, and deserve a chance to be the people that they are.

We will be raising awareness about the situation in Calais before, during and after the trip.

We are a cause supporting a cause, because solidarity helps strengthen community.

Please donate as little or as much as you can, everything makes a difference!

Read more here: https://thebristolskipchen.wordpress.com/2015/04/14/skipchen-solidarity-trip-to-calais-migrant-camp/

Calais Migrant Camp:
https://calaismigrantsolidarity.wordpress.com/

What We Need 
  • Our fuel costs for 2 x vehicles ( refrigerated van and mobile kitchen) = £300
  • Ferry tickets for 2 x vehicles = £300

What We've Done

  • We have already arranged all the food ourselves, and are sorting out equipment such as cooking tent, pots and pans, gas burners and gas bottles etc.
  • We have a refrigerated van and a mobile kitchen
  • We have organised a Fundraiser Dinner April 20th to raise extra money in case we don't reach our goal and to pay for containers, cutlery, water & other supply costs.

The Impact

Currently there is one permanent building that houses 50 vulnerable women & children and serves ONE hot meal at 5pm to only 600 people out of 2000 migrants.

There is 1 water point, no power, no toilets and no accommodation.

Although we recognise the impact we have is limited, by being able to provide food to as many people as possible in one week may be the difference between life and death and ill health for many desperate people.

Our presence also brings hope, positive energy and a message of support to a currently isolating and alienating experience in Europe.

Risks & Challenges

  • Risks involve sleeping & cooking in challenging conditions.
  • We might run of food in which case we will contact local food suppliers and go skipping around France so we can carry on feeding people throughout our stay.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share our campaign with your friends, colleagues and family!
  • Share/attend our Fundraiser Dinner on April 20th in Bristol https://www.facebook.com/events/620800721355479/
  • Donate men's shoes, sleeping bags, spices, cooking equipment, trestle tables, torches, sanitation products, jerry cans for water, lighters/matches etc

story:
Help us build our Youth Corner

AIC Jinja needs your help to create a youth corner. We have the space, now we just need the supplies! We need supplies for games, crafts, and activities that will be used to help teach the youth how to lead a healthy lifestyle and to create a HIV free generation. 

This is what we will be using the money we raise for:

  • Sporting Equipment
  • Arts and Crafts Supplies
  • Notebooks, pens, pencils, and markers
  • Television and DVD player
  • Books and Movies
  • Table Tennis 
  • And More!


A little goes a long way here in Uganda....

$1 USD = 2,500 Ugandan Shillings!

So please, help us build an environment that will support and empower youth to live  a healthy lifestyle and reach their full potential!

story:
CANterlot is Southern Ontario’s convention for MLP: Friendship is Magic, run by fans for fans. Our convention will be held in November 16-17, 2013 in, Toronto, Ontario, Canada. 

CANterlot Convention is a first year convention for "My Little Pony: Friendships is Magic" based in Toronto, Canada. 

 The convention at this point is 100% happening, regardless of how this Indiegogo preforms.  We still have many enthusiastic followers that still wish to donate to our cause for a reward and this Indiegogo is made for those awesome individuals and for any others that wish to help us along with the funds. This Indiegogo takes on more of a store perspective for you to buy our awesome products and help fund our cause at the same time.

 Find out more at: canterlotconvention.com 

 Facebook: facebook.com/CANterlotCon 

 Twitter: twitter.com/CANterlotCon 

 Our Goal:
 Running an awesome convention is slightly expensive, and the Princesses are far too busy with National affairs for us to bother them. So, we are looking to you Hoo-Mans to help with our initial fundraising to kick start the con. As an incentive, we are offering some great rewards for donating! Our goal is 1000 Bits... erhm dollars. This Indiegogo will go towards getting our musical talent and fandom guest to the convention.

 Delivery: 

As for rewards, shipping through portals from Equestria to Toronto is expensive. As such, all rewards will be giving out at the convention when you get your ticket. Anyone who donates but cannot attend, we will have it shipped after the convention to your door using Derpy Express Delivery, or another shipping company if you prefer it to be intact. All rewards from the previous campaign will also be available for pick up at the convention.

story:
A Centre for Conservation

Barbary Macaque Awareness and Conservation is an interdisciplinary conservation project that works to protect the fauna and flora of northern Morocco and the livelihoods of the people who live there.  The endangered Barbary macaque is a flagship species for our work and we use education and community initiatives to foster positive relationships between people, the macaque and the wildlife that shares its habitat.

One of our recent initiatives is the construction of a Conservation and Education Centre in the Rif mountains, near Bouhachem forest, which is the last stronghold of truly wild Barbary macaques.  With the help of our staff, volunteers and many members of local communities, we have succeeded in building foundations, walls and, most recently, a roof, but our progress has been stalled by a lack of funds.

We need your help to raise the money required to finish constructing the centre.  Helping us to achieve this will mean that we can conduct conservation education lessons in purpose-built classrooms; carry out research into public health, for the benefit of people and their domestic animals; and set up initiatives to share skills with community members so that they can develop small, sustainable agribusinesses.  

What We Need & What You Get

We need £2000 to buy the remaining building materials for the centre, to transport the materials from the town into the mountains, and to pay a bricklayer to complete the work.

As we will be developing sustainable agriculture initiatives at the centre, our perks are reflective of this.  A £20 donation will entitle you to have a native tree planted in your name; £50 means we will name a rescued battery chicken after you, and £100 gets you a personalised thank you message from the people who are helping to make the centre happen and who will ultimately benefit from it.

If we don't reach our goal, we'll use whatever money we do raise to buy as much building material as possible, while our fantastic team of local, national and international volunteers continue to raise funds through tireless campaigning and imaginative events.

Can't donate just now?  Don't worry - you can still make a huge contribution by sharing this campaign, spreading the word and telling people about Barbary Macaque Awareness and Conservation and our beautiful centre in the mountains. 

www.barbarymacaque.org

story:
Origin of Nights Full Nine

I'm Sai - an electronica producer, mom of three boys, metal dog in Chinese astrology, extroverted introvert, and lover of folkloric tales. I write music as a solo artist. In some ways, it's easier to work alone. You make all of the decisions and you're free to pursue whatever artistic direction catches your muse's attention. At the same time it becomes difficult to gauge progress. Creative growth often suffers from the lack of interaction with others.

Very much like the Hanged Man card in tarot, I spent several months in isolation, exploring my craft and figuring out what I wanted to achieve and how I wanted to express it. I came across this excerpt from the Poetic Edda (a collection of Norse poems):

"I ween that I hung on the windy tree, hung there for nights full nine; with the spear I was wounded, and offered I was to Odin, myself to myself, on the tree that none may ever know what root beneath it runs".

I know that time as a solo artist was valuable to me; I also know now that I am truly fulfilled when working as part of a collective.


Heart of Fire and Being a Stravinsky Geek

I've loved the fairytale and the score since I was a kid, and earlier this year I decided to try and create an electronica performance based on the Firebird Suite. It is called 'Heart of Fire' and it debuts May 17th at New Earth in Asheville.

What started out as an idea to have some models or dancers on stage with me during the performance evolved into a fully-realized show, with a script, iconic characters, a goblin horde, and a thrilling sword-fight. I could not have achieved that without the brilliant talent of the people who joined me for this journey:

SJ Tucker (singer/songwriter) http://music.sjtucker.com/

Richard Risbridger (Prince Ivan)  https://www.facebook.com/OnkelWoland

Draven Arcaene (Koschei the Deathless) https://www.facebook.com/draven.arcaene

Samuel Costilow (Zharpitsa the Firebird) https://www.facebook.com/samuel.costilow

Trixie Laroux (Princess Marie) https://www.facebook.com/thickdixie

Terina Plyler (Leshy the Wood Goblin) https://www.facebook.com/TerinaPlyler

Bob Nagan (Likho aka 'The Boblin') https://www.facebook.com/bob.nagan

Gypsy Jacob (Mavka the Fairy) https://www.facebook.com/haley.jacob

Eric France (photographer/graphic artist) https://www.facebook.com/eric.france

Rudy Aguilar (photographer/videographer) https://www.facebook.com/PaperStreetFoto

Sophia Jekic (makeup) https://www.facebook.com/sophia.jekic.52

Working with this incredible, talented people has been pure joy. I've never had so much fun, learned so much, felt so rewarded.

What We Need

In the first year, I plan to use the funds raised in this campaign to secure a constant rehearsal space for Nights Full Nine's productions.

In addition, some basic sound equipment to round out what we have, and a costume and set budget (which can be stretched quite a bit with the creative minds involved in this company!).

What You Get

If you contribute to our fundraiser, you'll get at least one free ticket to the next show, and you can get a lot more than that. We appreciate your generosity. So many of us are struggling to achieve goals, take care of basics, care for kids and elders, keep things afloat. I know it's not easy to help someone out and I want to make sure you're not disappointed in your decision to back Nights Full Nine!

If we don't reach our fundraiser goal, we'll still use the money raised to pay for rehearsal space, costumes and sets - instead of having rehearsal space covered until the year's end, it will get us to the next show. Big steps or baby steps - I intend on moving us forward!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, there are so many other ways you can help.

  • Talk to people about Nights Full Nine. If you're so inclined, get in touch with us and see if you can help with the show. We'd love to have you involved!
  • Use Indiegogo share tools and get the word out.
  • Volunteer for our street team and hand out flyers.
  • Click on our Facebook page and Like it. :D

story: This campaign is to help save the life of my co-worker and friend Jacky.   Jacky is a wonderful person and an inspiration to many. He is now, however in desperate need of treatment for his eating disorder.  Even with insurance it will cost around $6500 for the care he needs at a long term care facility.  At one time Jackie weighed ALMOST 600 lbs.  Jacky had surgery and then worked his butt off to lose almost 400 lbs. He went from being on disability to working as an aquatic trainer at Healthquest (where we met).  It is here, that through his story of weight loss, he inspired and gave hope to hundreds of our members.  However, over time, his weight loss and fear of gaining weight started taking its toll.  From not eating all day,  exercising hours a day, and taking pills (laxatives, etc),  his health started to decline.  His job is his life and he is doing the best he can at work.  My coworkers and I fear/know that if he does not get help soon, his body will shut down.  This is a LIFE AND DEATH situation.  The least I can do for such a good person and friend is try to raise money to help him.  SO PLEASE DONATE, TELL YOUR FRIENDS, POST ON FACEBOOK, AND HELP SAVE JACKY'S LIFE.  Any extra money raised will go toward his bills to help him while he is away!  THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR TIME AND DONATIONS!

story:
Reward bundles

Bronze bundle – 10$

Content: Poplinkz Gift-card of 20$, Exclusive "bronze pioneer" certificate

Silver bundle – 25$

Content: Poplinkz Gift card of 55$, 1 Poplinkz pen and the exclusive "silver pioneer" certificate.

Gold Bundle – 50$

Content: Poplinkz Gift card of 120$, 2 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "gold pioneer" certificate.

Platinum bundle – 100$

Content: Poplinkz Gift card of 250$, 1 exclusive Poplinkz T-shirt, 3 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "platinum pioneer" certificate.

Diamond bundle – 250$

Content: Poplinkz Gift card of 600$, 1 Android tablet, 2 exclusive Poplinkz T-shirts, 4 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "diamond pioneer" certificate.

Pearl bundle – 1000$

Content: Poplinkz Gift card of 3000$, 2 Android tablets, 3 exclusive Poplinkz T-shirts, 5 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "pearl pioneer" certificate.

Bonus: A list of the pearl pioneers will be added in our web page and will be given an authentic certificate of appreciation of their contribution to the success of Poplinkz.

We have the intention to add extra bonuses throughout the diffusion of our platform as our donation bank increase.  After every purchase of any bundle, every adequate bonus and extras will also be applicable.


Les trousses récompenses

Trousse exclusive Bronze - 10$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 20$, certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Bronze”

Trousse exclusive Argent - 25$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 55$, 1 crayon à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Argent”

Trousse exclusive Or - 50$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 120$, 2 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Or”

Trousse exclusive Platine - 100$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 250$, 1 T-shirt exclusif Poplinkz, 3 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Platine”

Trousse exclusive Diamant - 250$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 600$, 1 tablette Android, 2 T-shirts exclusifs Poplinkz, 4 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Diamant”

Trousse exclusive Perle - 1000$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 3000$, 2 tablettes Android, 3 T-shirts exclusifs Poplinkz, 5 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Perle”

BONUS : Nom sur la liste des pionniers Perle sur notre site Web, certificat de remerciement authentique des plus grands collaborateurs au succès de Poplinkz.


Nous avons grandement l'intention d'ajouter des bonus à chacun de nos trousses au fur et à mesure que les montants amassés augmenteront. Même si un bonus est ajouté après l’achat d’une trousse, les trousses seront remis avec tous les bonus applicables.



Pour la présentation en français, voir plus bas.





About us 



Our story

The company Poplinkz has been incorporated since February 22nd 2013 by Gabriel Comtois. The revolutionary project was founded after 2 long  years of preparation and hard work  all from his basement. On June 28th 2013, four new collaborators joined the company and became part of the foundation of the company. In august 2013, Poplinkz set up their first office space in the downtown Montreal area in order to set in motion the commercialization of the venture. Thus far, the launch of the platform is scheduled for autumn 2014.

Our Mission

To offer a new commercial life to the consumers in which they are valued by their recognition that allows them to discover, win and save everyday with the businesses that are willing to take a step forward.

Our values

The value we aspire to transmit through Poplinkz is our integrity. Our desire is to cater to consumers needs by merging them with their preferred merchant. Along with their vivacity, incorporate their commercial life. Consequently, with a fiery energy this will allow businesses to be prominent. Above all, to enhance equality, allowing businesses the ability to reward their most loyal customers. Consumers will develop a sense of devotion and prone a long term business relationship considering all of their actions, purchases and interactions from their most constant vendors.

Our vision

Become a daily and an inevitable tool to consumers on a global scale. This will involve the underlying playfulness of this new technological era. 


Our team 


Overview

We are young entrepreneurs with a key eye of today’s market tendencies, among bright knowledge of the latest technology and with the objective to change the commercial reality for the better. Our ambitions are to generate a new business life without recurring. To being determined in order to succeed and achieve our goals.


Gabriel Comtois

President - General Director and Founder

In 2012, Gabriel decides to go forward with his visionary project and to create Poplinkz. Gabriel takes the position of president and general director to govern the company to its expansion. His role in the company allows him to demonstrate altogether his creativity, his strategic vision and his flair to serve the platform. Poplinkz is Gabriel’s biggest achievement. His most wish is to offer a real added value to all of his customers.

Ideas, creation, management, vision, values


Kevin Mayer

Vice-president of human resources

With more than 10 years of sales experience and customer’s service, Kevin was searching for new challenges to accomplish. In June 2013, Kevin joins the company with the title of vice-president of human resources. With his comprehension ability, along with his people skills and his tact, make up the qualities that put together the ideal mentor for individuals and a one of kind negotiator. Kevin is responsible for all the training, internal relations, hiring staff, negotiations, company’s politics and all of the decision making of the company. Poplinkz is his opportunity to revolutionize the commercial industry. 

Business relations, leadership, integrity, opportunities


Felix Lapointe

Vice-President of marketing 

Curious and filled with ambitions, Felix decides to conquer the marketing area of the company. He will be able to accomplish himself by following his day-to-day challenges. Furthermore this will permit him to broaden his horizon and seek trendsetting solutions.  Felix is known for his positive attitude and his team spirit. Within the company, he is responsible for the marketing strategies, market analysis, consumer behavior and external relationships.

Dedication, synergy, ambition, strength


Jonathan Renaud

Vice-President of Finances

For Jonathan, numbers are no secret. His undeniable work ethic and well organized manners make him the most structured player of the team. Jonathan has an academic background in accounting as well as in management. Jonathan has exposed his dedication and he is currently responsible of the accounting and financial forecast of the company.

Order, structure, measurability, logic


Sasha Sayegh

Vice-President of sales

Equipped with an energetic and a strong personality, what makes Sasha stand out is his strength in sales. With over 10 years of experience, he masters his fields quite satisfactorily. These skills he portrays allowed him to gain the position of vice-president of sales in the company.

Spiritual, courage, determination, cooperation


What we have acquired up to date. 

We are currently based in an office of 1,100 squares feet at 1118 Saint-Catherine O, suite 204 in Montreal. We have an administrative board governed by each one of our department’s leaders. This scheme has been put in place with the purpose to reach our objective. Internally, there’s a sales team that we deploy in the region of Montreal, a team of programmers with the sole purpose to develop and manage the platform. Multiple partners help with the consultation of the day-to-day task., something which we do not have the resources to accomplish ourselves yet. We currently have more than 40 businesses that have signed with Poplinkz. The company also has over more than a thousand consumers awaiting for our official launch. 


Our needs

Being able to sustain the company until we are independent of our own resources and profitability. 

Increase the speed of development of the platform without compromising our reliability and functionalities. 

Organize an official launch with the sufficient strength with an aim of going viral. Build worldwide statement that will generate a global movement. 


Our target

We want to improve our sales tools, expand throughout the province of Quebec and be prepared to launch our alpha version by June. 

Why? To be available in a structured and mannered way. As a result the province will allow us to be more efficient in order  to sustain our needs of being profitable. In sequence to proceed, we need a tangible product which will facilitate the expansion of the company.

Ideal budget: 50,000$


We want to employ a full time technical team and a communication team.

Why? A technical team will allow us to progress faster through the development of the platform at twice the speed that we currently are. This team will allow us to improve our functionalities along with a more competent technical support. In addition, a good communication team will bring in an added value. Once we release the application it will bring a better user experience to our platform. 

Ideal budget: 150,000$


Proceed with the international expansion strategies

Why? Our strategy consists of executing a precise action plan for Poplinkz with the intention of expanding its services to potential countries. This association will give us the advantage to create thousands of employment opportunities throughout the world, evidently having a positive impact on the economy. The revenue that ought to be made in foreign areas will contribute to improve the platform in terms of development and assuring prosperity for the company.

Ideal budget: 300,000$


Our advantages

Overview 

Our platform will consent  to all of the consumers signed in to discover, win, and save on everyday purchases.  These advantages will be amplified by the return of PLZ points in which users will have accumulated through the platform and will also be given the chance to purchase those points. 

We want to offer Poplinkz’s gift certificates to those who will purchase PLZ points. Those points will allow individuals to engage in the Poplinkz experience and be a step ahead from their family and friends. Not to mention, all the saving, discovering and winning they will start to profit from.

A certificate system will also be implemented in the platform. Users that will interact in the platform will earn certificates. The earned certificate will unlock specific benefits that will let them gain more points or earn exclusivity in the platform. The list of each certificate earned will be shown in the respective profile of the user and can be viewed within the network.

To those who will contribute to our success we will offer exclusive certificates to show our gratitude.


Reward bundles

Bronze bundle – 10$

Content: Gift-card of 20$, Exclusive "bronze pioneer" certificate

Silver bundle – 25$

Content: Gift card of 55$, 1 Poplinkz pen and the exclusive "silver pioneer" certificate.

Gold Bundle – 50$

Content: Gift card of 120$, 2 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "gold pioneer" certificate.

Platinum bundle – 100$

Content: Gift card of 250$, 1 exclusive Poplinkz T-shirt, 3 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "platinum pioneer" certificate.

Diamond bundle – 250$

Content: Gift card of 600$, 1 Android tablet, 2 exclusive Poplinkz T-shirts, 4 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "diamond pioneer" certificate.

Pearl bundle – 1000$

Content: Gift card of 3000$, 2 Android tablets, 3 exclusive Poplinkz T-shirts, 5 Poplinkz pens and the exclusive "pearl pioneer" certificate.

Bonus: A list of the pearl pioneers will be added in our web page and will be given an authentic certificate of appreciation of their contribution to the success of Poplinkz.


We have the intention to add extra bonuses throughout the diffusion of our platform as our donation bank increase.  After every purchase of any bundle, every adequate bonus and extras will also be applicable.


The impact

“Our fundamental purpose of existence comes from the lack of satisfaction in the commercial universe. Actual information technologies are complicated and lack inspiration. Nowadays advertisements are excessive and tend to invade our personal space. Announcements are available in our televisions, in our radios, in our mail, on the Internet and everywhere we turn our heads and for this we inclining towards making a difference."

- Gabriel Comtois, CEO of Poplinkz -

With Poplinkz, we would like for you to enjoy a practical and entertaining virtual universe. Come and live a simple and innovative experience through our electronic shopping center and connect with your friends and favorite stores. Favor a peaceful mind and always be the winner of your personal interest.

Help us achieve and promote this dream into everyone’s lives. 


The foundation

We are proud to support ‘’The foundation of the little treasures” (Fondation des petits trésors). Mental health is a priority that we hold dear and it is currently an issue in our modern world.  It is important for Poplinkz to give back and contribute to the mental well being of those who need it the most. Therefore by providing them with the right resources this will contribute to serve a better consciousness to the future generations that will need the extra strength to strive in our world. This is why we will donate 2% of our net income of the platform for this cause.

Help us improve the world of tomorrow!

http://petitstresors.ca/


CONTRIBUTE IN 3 SIMPLES STEPS!


1.Sign up on Poplinkz.com for free
(English version available on may 12th)


2.Boost your contribution by sharing our website!


3.Make a donation and receive a reward bundle at the launch of our platform.


Follow the movement now!



Présentation en français




À propos de nous



Notre histoire

Poplinkz a été fondée en 2012 par Gabriel Comtois suite à 2 ans de travail sur ce projet révolutionnaire de son propre domicile. Le 28 juin 2013, 4 nouveaux collaborateurs rejoignent la compagnie afin de former le cœur fondateur. En août 2013, Poplinkz s’installe au centre-ville de Montréal et débute l’élaboration d’un plan de commercialisation. L'ouverture de la plate-forme est prévue en automne 2014.

Notre mission

Offrir au monde une toute nouvelle vie commerciale dans laquelle les consommateurs sont mis en valeur par la reconnaissance tout en leur permettant de découvrir, de gagner et d’économiser chaque jour parmi les entreprises qui se démarquent.


Nos valeurs

L’intégrité, favoriser le consommateur à s’intégrer à ses commerces favoris. La vivacité, imprégner la vie commerciale d’une énergie vive en entraînant les commerces à se démarquer davantage. L’équité, récompenser les consommateurs aux moindres petits détails. Le dévouement, prôner les relations d’affaires à long terme en considérant entièrement tous les actes, achats ou interactions du client.


Notre vision

Devenir un outil inévitable dans le quotidien des consommateurs à l’échelle mondiale tout en apportant un aspect ludique latent dans la nouvelle ère technologique.


Notre équipe


Survol

Nous sommes de jeunes entrepreneurs ayant un œil vif sur la tendance du marché, une connaissance enrichie de la technologie, le désir de faire changer les choses en mieux, l’ambition de créer une nouvelle vie commerciale sans précédent et la détermination d’y arriver.


Gabriel Comtois

Président-directeur général et fondateur

En 2012, Gabriel décide d’y aller à fond avec son projet embryonnaire et fonde Poplinkz. Gabriel prend la barre de l’entreprise à titre de président, directeur général. Sous sa gouverne, l’entreprise prend de l’expansion. Son rôle dans l’entreprise lui permet de retrouver une vue d’ensemble et de mettre sa créativité, sa vision stratégique et son flair au service de sa plateforme. Poplinkz est pour Gabriel sa plus grande réalisation. Son vœu le plus cher est d’offrir une réelle valeur ajoutée à ses clients.

Idées, création, gestion, vision, valeurs 


Kevin Mayer

Vice-président, ressources humaines

Fort de son expérience acquise lors d’une décennie dans la vente et le service à la clientèle, Kevin s’est joint à l’entreprise en 2013 à titre de vice-président aux ressources humaines. Sa compréhension, son tact et son entregent font de lui un mentor idéal et un négociateur hors pair. Kevin s’occupe des formations, des relations internes, de l’embauche et des négociations, des politiques de gestion et il prend part dans le processus de prise de décisions globales. Poplinkz est pour lui une opportunité de révolutionner l’univers commercial. 

Relations, leadership, intégrité, opportunités


Félix Lapointe

Vice-président, marketing

Curieux et débordant d’ambition, Félix décide de se lancer dans le marketing où il peut enfin se réaliser.  Les défis de son quotidien lui permettent de sortir de sa zone de confort et de trouver des solutions avant-gardistes. Félix est reconnu pour son attitude positive et son sens du travail d’équipe. Au sein de l’entreprise, il est responsable des stratégies d’approches, de l’analyse des marchés, du comportement de consommation et des relations externes.

Dévouement, synergie, ambition, vigueur


Jonathan Renaud

Vice-président, finances

Pour Jonathan, les chiffres n’ont aucun secret. Sa structure infaillible et son organisation font de lui le joueur le plus cartésien de l’équipe. Jonathan a une formation en comptabilité et en gestion. Investi dans l’entreprise depuis les tout débuts, Jonathan se charge des prévisions financières et de la comptabilité. 

Ordre, structure, mesurabilité, logique


Sasha Sayegh

Vice-président, ventes

Doté d’une personnalité énergique et d’une force de caractère sans égal, Sasha se démarque dans le milieu des ventes. Après 10 ans d’expérience sur le terrain, sa maîtrise du domaine lui permet d’acquérir le titre de vice-président des ventes au sein de l’entreprise.

Esprit, courage, détermination, coopération


Ce que nous avons actuellement

Nous sommes présentement installés dans un bureau de 1,100 pied carré au 1118 suite 204 de la rue Ste-Catherine Ouest à Montréal. Nous avons un conseil administratif encadrant chaque département nécessaire à notre réussite, une équipe de vente déployée sur la région de Montréal, une équipe technique travaillant sur le développement de la plateforme ainsi que plusieurs partenaires en consultation et services professionnels pour combler ce que nous n’avons pas la capacité de faire. Nous avons actuellement plus de 40 entreprises inscrites à notre actif ainsi que plus d’un millier de consommateurs en attente de l’ouverture de la plateforme.


Nos besoins

Avoir la capacité de subvenir aux besoins de l’entreprise jusqu’à ce que nous soyons rentables.

Accélérer le processus de développement sans compromettre la fiabilité et les fonctions de la plateforme.

Organiser un lancement très puissant en créant un buzz géant et déclencher un mouvement d’échelle mondiale.


Nos objectifs

Perfectionner notre éventail d’outils de vente, étendre notre territoire à travers la province du Québec en entier et lancer notre version Alpha en Juin.


Pourquoi? Être présent de façon structurée dans la province complète nous permettra d’avoir un roulement assez important pour subvenir à nos besoins et être rentable. Pour se faire, il nous faut un produit tangible ainsi qu’un éventail d’outils de vente concret pour faciliter la vente aux entreprises.

Budget idéal - 50,000.00$
Engager une équipe technique à temps plein ainsi qu’une équipe de communication.

Pourquoi? Une équipe technique à temps plein fera progresser le développement de la plateforme à un rythme au moins 2 fois plus rapide que ce que nous avons présentement et nous permettra d’avoir des fonctionnalités améliorés ainsi qu’un soutien technique plus efficace. Une bonne équipe de communication apportera une augmentation importante de l’achalandage dès l’ouverture sans oublier un design énormément plus léché et agréable visuellement ce qui améliorera grandement l’expérience de l’utilisateur sur la plateforme.

Budget idéal - 150,000.00$


Démarrer la stratégie d’expansion internationale

Pourquoi? Notre stratégie consiste à exécuter un plan d’action précis et uniforme dans tous les pays potentiels à l’expansion de Poplinkz. Ce mouvement a le potentiel de créer des milliers d’emplois dans le monde en plus d’avoir un impact bénéfique sur l’économie mondiale. Les revenus générés à l’étranger permettront également à Poplinkz d’avoir une plateforme beaucoup plus développée avec une prospérité assurée.

Budget idéal - 300,000.00$


Nos avantages

Survol

Notre plateforme permettra à tout consommateur inscrit GRATUITEMENT de découvrir, de gagner et d’économiser chaque jour. Ces avantages peuvent être amplifiés grâce aux PLZ points, ils sont accumulés sur la plateforme et peuvent aussi être achetés pour de l’argent.

Nous offrirons des certificats-cadeaux Poplinkz utilisables pour l’achat de ces points! Ce qui permettra à toute personne intéressée de démarrer l’expérience Poplinkz avec un pas en avant de ses amis! Et ainsi donc économiser, découvrir et gagner encore plus!

Un système de certificat sera également présent sur la plateforme. Les certificats sont mérités par les gens qui interagiront considérablement sur la plateforme. L’obtention d’un certificat peut débloquer certains avantages en plus d’acquérir des gains tels que des points ou encore des exclusivités! La liste des certificats acquis se retrouve dans le profil de chaque consommateur inscrit sur la plateforme et peut être vue à travers le réseau!

Nous offrirons également différents certificats exclusifs uniquement à ceux qui ont contribué à notre succès. Ces certificats se retrouveront de façon permanente dans la liste de certificats du profil du contribuant.



Les trousses récompenses

Trousse exclusive Bronze - 10$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 20$, certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Bronze”

Trousse exclusive Argent - 25$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 55$, 1 crayon à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Argent”

Trousse exclusive Or - 50$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 120$, 2 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Or”

Trousse exclusive Platine - 100$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 250$, 1 T-shirt exclusif Poplinkz, 3 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Platine”

Trousse exclusive Diamant - 250$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 600$, 1 tablette Android, 2 T-shirts exclusifs Poplinkz, 4 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Diamant”

Trousse exclusive Perle - 1000$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 3000$, 2 tablettes Android, 3 T-shirts exclusifs Poplinkz, 5 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Perle”

BONUS : Nom sur la liste des pionniers Perle sur notre site Web, certificat de remerciement authentique des plus grands collaborateurs au succès de Poplinkz.


Nous avons grandement l'intention d'ajouter des bonus à chacun de nos trousses au fur et à mesure que les montants amassés augmenteront. Même si un bonus est ajouté après l’achat d’une trousse, les trousses seront remis avec tous les bonus applicables.


L’impact

“Notre raison fondamentale d’exister provient du manque de vie et de plaisir dans l’univers commercial. Les technologies d’informations actuelles sont trop compliquées et manquent d’inspiration. La publicité en majorité est imposée de façon très excessive dans nos vies. Que ce soit dans nos émissions de télévision, à la radio au bon milieu de nos chansons, parmi nos courriers, pendant notre navigation sur le web, partout où nous regardons.”

- Gabriel Comtois, PDG de Poplinkz -

Avec Poplinkz, plongez dans un univers virtuel divertissant et agréable. Vivez simplement avec de nouvelles expériences à travers un centre commercial électronique connecté à vos amis et à vos entreprises favorites. Favorisez votre tranquillité d’esprit en étant toujours gagnant au coeur de vos intérêts.

Aidez-nous à répandre la proposition de ce rêve dans la vie de tous!


La fondation

Nous sommes très fiers de soutenir la cause de la fondation les petits trésors. La santé mentale est selon nous un enjeu majeur dans le monde d’aujourd’hui. Il est impératif pour Poplinkz de contribuer à l’amélioration de nos connaissances ainsi qu’à l’abondance de ressources disponibles pour les gens à qui ils sont bénéfiques, amener une meilleure conscience pour notre génération et munir la prochaine d’une force supplémentaire. C’est pourquoi nous verserons avec honneur 2% du revenu net de la plateforme à la fondation les petits trésors.

Aidez-nous à améliorer le monde de demain!

http://petitstresors.ca/

CONTRIBUEZ MAINTENANT EN 3 ÉTAPES SIMPLES!

1. Inscrivez-vous sur poplinkz.com c’est GRATUIT!


2. Multipliez directement votre contribution en partageant notre site web!


3. Faites une contribution et recevez une trousse récompense dès l’ouverture de notre plateforme!



SUIVEZ LE MOUVEMENT DÈS MAINTENANT!

The impact

“Our fundamental purpose of existence comes from the lack of satisfaction in the commercial universe. Actual information technologies are complicated and lack inspiration. Nowadays advertisements are excessive and tend to invade our personal space. Announcements are available in our televisions, in our radios, in our mail, on the Internet and everywhere we turn our heads and for this we inclining towards making a difference."

- Gabriel Comtois, CEO of Poplinkz -

With Poplinkz, we would like for you to enjoy a practical and entertaining virtual universe. Come and live a simple and innovative experience through our electronic shopping center and connect with your friends and favorite stores. Favor a peaceful mind and always be the winner of your personal interest.

Help us achieve and promote this dream into everyone’s lives. 



The foundation

We are proud to support ‘’The foundation of the little treasures” (Fondation des petits trésors). Mental health is a priority that we hold dear and it is currently an issue in our modern world.  It is important for Poplinkz to give back and contribute to the mental well being of those who need it the most. Therefore by providing them with the right resources this will contribute to serve a better consciousness to the future generations that will need the extra strength to strive in our world. This is why we will donate 2% of our net income of the platform for this cause.

Help us improve the world of tomorrow!

http://petitstresors.ca/






CONTRIBUTE IN 3 SIMPLES STEPS!

1.Sign up on Poplinkz.com for free(English version available on may 12th)2.Boost your contribution by sharing our website!
3.Make a donation and receive a reward bundle at the launch of our platform.







Follow the movement now!Présentation en françaisÀ propos de nous

Notre histoire
Poplinkz a été fondée en 2012 par Gabriel Comtois suite à 2 ans de travail sur ce projet révolutionnaire de son propre domicile. Le 28 juin 2013, 4 nouveaux collaborateurs rejoignent la compagnie afin de former le cœur fondateur. En août 2013, Poplinkz s’installe au centre-ville de Montréal et débute l’élaboration d’un plan de commercialisation. L'ouverture de la plate-forme est prévue en automne 2014.

Notre mission
Offrir au monde une toute nouvelle vie commerciale dans laquelle les consommateurs sont mis en valeur par la reconnaissance tout en leur permettant de découvrir, de gagner et d’économiser chaque jour parmi les entreprises qui se démarquent.Nos valeurs
L’intégrité, favoriser le consommateur à s’intégrer à ses commerces favoris. La vivacité, imprégner la vie commerciale d’une énergie vive en entraînant les commerces à se démarquer davantage. L’équité, récompenser les consommateurs aux moindres petits détails. Le dévouement, prôner les relations d’affaires à long terme en considérant entièrement tous les actes, achats ou interactions du client.Notre visionDevenir un outil inévitable dans le quotidien des consommateurs à l’échelle mondiale tout en apportant un aspect ludique latent dans la nouvelle ère technologique.Notre équipe

Survol
Nous sommes de jeunes entrepreneurs ayant un œil vif sur la tendance du marché, une connaissance enrichie de la technologie, le désir de faire changer les choses en mieux, l’ambition de créer une nouvelle vie commerciale sans précédent et la détermination d’y arriver.Gabriel Comtois
Président-directeur général et fondateur
En 2012, Gabriel décide d’y aller à fond avec son projet embryonnaire et fonde Poplinkz. Gabriel prend la barre de l’entreprise à titre de président, directeur général. Sous sa gouverne, l’entreprise prend de l’expansion. Son rôle dans l’entreprise lui permet de retrouver une vue d’ensemble et de mettre sa créativité, sa vision stratégique et son flair au service de sa plateforme. Poplinkz est pour Gabriel sa plus grande réalisation. Son vœu le plus cher est d’offrir une réelle valeur ajoutée à ses clients.Idées, création, gestion, vision, valeurs 


Kevin Mayer
Vice-président, ressources humaines

Fort de son expérience acquise lors d’une décennie dans la vente et le service à la clientèle, Kevin s’est joint à l’entreprise en 2013 à titre de vice-président aux ressources humaines. Sa compréhension, son tact et son entregent font de lui un mentor idéal et un négociateur hors pair. Kevin s’occupe des formations, des relations internes, de l’embauche et des négociations, des politiques de gestion et il prend part dans le processus de prise de décisions globales. Poplinkz est pour lui une opportunité de révolutionner l’univers commercial. Relations, leadership, intégrité, opportunités


Félix Lapointe
Vice-président, marketing

Curieux et débordant d’ambition, Félix décide de se lancer dans le marketing où il peut enfin se réaliser.  Les défis de son quotidien lui permettent de sortir de sa zone de confort et de trouver des solutions avant-gardistes. Félix est reconnu pour son attitude positive et son sens du travail d’équipe. Au sein de l’entreprise, il est responsable des stratégies d’approches, de l’analyse des marchés, du comportement de consommation et des relations externes.

Dévouement, synergie, ambition, vigueur


Jonathan Renaud
Vice-président, finances

Pour Jonathan, les chiffres n’ont aucun secret. Sa structure infaillible et son organisation font de lui le joueur le plus cartésien de l’équipe. Jonathan a une formation en comptabilité et en gestion. Investi dans l’entreprise depuis les tout débuts, Jonathan se charge des prévisions financières et de la comptabilité. 

Ordre, structure, mesurabilité, logique


Sasha Sayegh
Vice-président, ventes

Doté d’une personnalité énergique et d’une force de caractère sans égal, Sasha se démarque dans le milieu des ventes. Après 10 ans d’expérience sur le terrain, sa maîtrise du domaine lui permet d’acquérir le titre de vice-président des ventes au sein de l’entreprise.

Esprit, courage, détermination, coopération


Ce que nous avons actuellement

Nous sommes présentement installés dans un bureau de 1,100 pied carré au 1118 suite 204 de la rue Ste-Catherine Ouest à Montréal. Nous avons un conseil administratif encadrant chaque département nécessaire à notre réussite, une équipe de vente déployée sur la région de Montréal, une équipe technique travaillant sur le développement de la plateforme ainsi que plusieurs partenaires en consultation et services professionnels pour combler ce que nous n’avons pas la capacité de faire. Nous avons actuellement plus de 40 entreprises inscrites à notre actif ainsi que plus d’un millier de consommateurs en attente de l’ouverture de la plateforme.

Nos besoins

Avoir la capacité de subvenir aux besoins de l’entreprise jusqu’à ce que nous soyons rentables.Accélérer le processus de développement sans compromettre la fiabilité et les fonctions de la plateforme.

Organiser un lancement très puissant en créant un buzz géant et déclencher un mouvement d’échelle mondiale.

Nos objectifs

Perfectionner notre éventail d’outils de vente, étendre notre territoire à travers la province du Québec en entier et lancer notre version Alpha en Juin.
Pourquoi? Être présent de façon structurée dans la province complète nous permettra d’avoir un roulement assez important pour subvenir à nos besoins et être rentable. Pour se faire, il nous faut un produit tangible ainsi qu’un éventail d’outils de vente concret pour faciliter la vente aux entreprises.Budget idéal - 50,000.00$
Engager une équipe technique à temps plein ainsi qu’une équipe de communication.Pourquoi? Une équipe technique à temps plein fera progresser le développement de la plateforme à un rythme au moins 2 fois plus rapide que ce que nous avons présentement et nous permettra d’avoir des fonctionnalités améliorés ainsi qu’un soutien technique plus efficace. Une bonne équipe de communication apportera une augmentation importante de l’achalandage dès l’ouverture sans oublier un design énormément plus léché et agréable visuellement ce qui améliorera grandement l’expérience de l’utilisateur sur la plateforme.Budget idéal - 150,000.00$

Démarrer la stratégie d’expansion internationale

Pourquoi? Notre stratégie consiste à exécuter un plan d’action précis et uniforme dans tous les pays potentiels à l’expansion de Poplinkz. Ce mouvement a le potentiel de créer des milliers d’emplois dans le monde en plus d’avoir un impact bénéfique sur l’économie mondiale. Les revenus générés à l’étranger permettront également à Poplinkz d’avoir une plateforme beaucoup plus développée avec une prospérité assurée.

Budget idéal - 300,000.00$

Nos avantages



Survol
Notre plateforme permettra à tout consommateur inscrit GRATUITEMENT de découvrir, de gagner et d’économiser chaque jour. Ces avantages peuvent être amplifiés grâce aux PLZ points, ils sont accumulés sur la plateforme et peuvent aussi être achetés pour de l’argent.
Nous offrirons des certificats-cadeaux Poplinkz utilisables pour l’achat de ces points! Ce qui permettra à toute personne intéressée de démarrer l’expérience Poplinkz avec un pas en avant de ses amis! Et ainsi donc économiser, découvrir et gagner encore plus!
Un système de certificat sera également présent sur la plateforme. Les certificats sont mérités par les gens qui interagiront considérablement sur la plateforme. L’obtention d’un certificat peut débloquer certains avantages en plus d’acquérir des gains tels que des points ou encore des exclusivités! La liste des certificats acquis se retrouve dans le profil de chaque consommateur inscrit sur la plateforme et peut être vue à travers le réseau!
Nous offrirons également différents certificats exclusifs uniquement à ceux qui ont contribué à notre succès. Ces certificats se retrouveront de façon permanente dans la liste de certificats du profil du contribuant.
Les trousses récompenses


Trousse exclusive Bronze - 10$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 20$, certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Bronze”

Trousse exclusive Argent - 25$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 55$, 1 crayon à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Argent”

Trousse exclusive Or - 50$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 120$, 2 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Or”

Trousse exclusive Platine - 100$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 250$, 1 T-shirt exclusif Poplinkz, 3 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Platine”

Trousse exclusive Diamant - 250$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 600$, 1 tablette Android, 2 T-shirts exclusifs Poplinkz, 4 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Diamant”

Trousse exclusive Perle - 1000$

Contenu : Carte-cadeau Poplinkz de 3000$, 2 tablettes Android, 3 T-shirts exclusifs Poplinkz, 5 crayons à l'encre Poplinkz ainsi que le certificat EXCLUSIF “Pionnier Perle”
BONUS : Nom sur la liste des pionniers Perle sur notre site Web, certificat de remerciement authentique des plus grands collaborateurs au succès de Poplinkz.
Nous avons grandement l'intention d'ajouter des bonus à chacun de nos trousses au fur et à mesure que les montants amassés augmenteront. Même si un bonus est ajouté après l’achat d’une trousse, les trousses seront remis avec tous les bonus applicables.



L’impact

“Notre raison fondamentale d’exister provient du manque de vie et de plaisir dans l’univers commercial. Les technologies d’informations actuelles sont trop compliquées et manquent d’inspiration. La publicité en majorité est imposée de façon très excessive dans nos vies. Que ce soit dans nos émissions de télévision, à la radio au bon milieu de nos chansons, parmi nos courriers, pendant notre navigation sur le web, partout où nous regardons.”

- Gabriel Comtois, PDG de Poplinkz -

Avec Poplinkz, plongez dans un univers virtuel divertissant et agréable. Vivez simplement avec de nouvelles expériences à travers un centre commercial électronique connecté à vos amis et à vos entreprises favorites. Favorisez votre tranquillité d’esprit en étant toujours gagnant au coeur de vos intérêts.

Aidez-nous à répandre la proposition de ce rêve dans la vie de tous!

La fondation

Nous sommes très fiers de soutenir la cause de la fondation les petits trésors. La santé mentale est selon nous un enjeu majeur dans le monde d’aujourd’hui. Il est impératif pour Poplinkz de contribuer à l’amélioration de nos connaissances ainsi qu’à l’abondance de ressources disponibles pour les gens à qui ils sont bénéfiques, amener une meilleure conscience pour notre génération et munir la prochaine d’une force supplémentaire. C’est pourquoi nous verserons avec honneur 2% du revenu net de la plateforme à la fondation les petits trésors.

Aidez-nous à améliorer le monde de demain!

http://petitstresors.ca/CONTRIBUEZ MAINTENANT EN 3 ÉTAPES SIMPLES!


1. Inscrivez-vous sur poplinkz.com c’est GRATUIT!

2. Multipliez directement votre contribution en partageant notre site web!

3. Faites une contribution et recevez une trousse récompense dès l’ouverture de notre plateforme!






SUIVEZ LE MOUVEMENT DÈS MAINTENANT!

story:
WOW, an organization devoted creating a world of wonder- in the literal sense of making life wonderful for both women and men. The goal of WOW is to give back to the community in terms of education, awareness, economics and hands on experience regarding issues both genders face today.

WOW came together by 3 women who wanted to help  making the world a better place. After attending one Safe for Life workshop and seeing what is offered to help and protect women, we decided to team up with Wes Derequito of Ara Academy, the creator of Safe for Life Montreal. His vision to create a proper program which offers education, mental and emotional help as well as physical training for women lacked funds. Not all women can afford to get the help required as the process in helping a battered woman is different versus a woman who wants to make sure she is never in that situation. WE SHOULDN'T HAVE TO BE SCARED OR APOLOGIZE FOR BEING WOMEN!!!! Let's get together to be part of the change!!!

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Ideally we would need a good 5000$ to get the program running. The money would go to studio set up, education materials, paying yoga instructors as well as trainers and expenses that are there for a year. The Funds raised from this platform would go into creating all of that as well as making sure for a year at least women can get the help they need.

WOW will be organizing an event using Fashion. Fashion is just another form of art allowing us to express ourselves. It can be used to represent a woman’s strength, desire or state of mind. Thinking about the social issues the actual woman faces, we denounce this society scream of a woman’s sensuality freedom. This means to be able to embrace her own sensuality and to make peace with her dreams and fantasies. We discuss this idea through the stylism of decent and chic yet playful looks in order to have a positive impact on the mind and soul of our guests. About the body empowerment.

Regardless of how much we raise with this platform, the funds will still go towards Safe for Life. A change only happens when collective voices and resources are raised.

We will be offering some perks, to let the contributors know that their donations have gone to the right cause. They might not be anything fancy, but we always want to say thank you as every dollar counts.

The Impact

To understand the basis of Safe of Life, here is a summary of what  ONE Safe for Life workshop is about and what we want to build from.

SAFE FOR LIFE PROGRAM SUMMARY

The primary goal of the SAFE FOR LIFE PROGRAM is to teach women aspects of self-development through the practice of self-defense and to promote the understanding  self-respect. We start by defining the true nature of self-defense, which begins with the "self " - being aware of one's mental, emotional and physical attritubutes and more importantly, understanding the role of "ego".

The women will learn how to manage fear and understand the difference between true fear and unwarranted fear, through specific exercises that avoid a false sense of security.


 We also cover environmental/situational awareness, including recognizing and avoiding potential violent situations. We then train the women to understand direct behaviour and physical/psychological cues in order to act accordingly using relatively simple yet, highly effective concepts.

By the end of this program, each individual will be able to:

  1. Evaluate and develop themselves physically, psychologically and emotionally by understanding their strengths and limited beliefs, to better evaluate and manage any situation.

  2. Understand  their surroundings and their physical, psychological and emotional environment.

  3. Understand the pre-contact phases, specifically human communication (human behaviour and body language), and how to use verbal diffusion.

  4. Develop the appropriate action for the appropriate reaction. “Action–Reaction-Action.”

  5. To care about the “self” aspect – because everybody is worth fighting for, and it might as well be themselves doing it.

    This program is designed for women in their late teens or older. No prior experience necessary. This is not a traditional martial arts program, rather a reality based self-defense program. 

We sincerely hope that you can be part of this, and help us achieve our goals!

 Learn. Develop. Grow. Be the change. Be safe

Other ways to help:

We understand that sometimes it is hard to donate, but please contribute by spreading awareness and spreading the word. It would mean a lot!

No prior experience necessary. This is not a traditional martial arts program, rather a reality based self-defense program. 

We sincerely hope that you can be part of this, and help us achieve our goals!
 Learn. Develop. Grow. Be the change. Be safe


Other ways to help:

story:
Short Summary

Green Leaf Terrain was created from a long love for war gaming and scale modelling. It is our goal to provide the war gaming community with an alternative for their war gaming terrain needs. With a variety of games on the market, custom terrain is always in demand and that is exactly what Green Leaf Terrain provides; realistic terrain pieces for any battlefield. We have also expanded into miniature painting commissions!

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is geared towards improving our existing equipment and acquiring other equipment to improve the quality of our video's and photo's. Along with changes to our website to provide the community with more of a place for inspiration; both for terrain and miniature painting.      

Perks for the most part are self explanatory.

Perk $5- If we are not able to collect enough for a full table build (around $2000) then I will put all of these contributions will be put towards creating a few pieces for them to use on their existing tables. 

Perk $35- Contributors will be contacted via email as to their needs for the custom wall set (such as color scheme, foliage/season/landscape type).

Perk $50- Contributors will be sent an email with a COUPON CODE which can then be put towards the painting of 1 highly detailed miniature.

Perk $75-$1500- Contributors will be sent an email with a COUPON CODE which can then be put towards custom terrain projects.

**NOTE**

All perk levels above $250 will also receive a Green Leaf Terrain T-Shirt and a MIni Poster (singing optional) 

The Impact

Green Leaf Terrain studio has been in business for over a year and half. Made some highly detailed terrain pieces and full tables; and have continued to improved the quality of our work each step of the way. 

Making these changes will help us be able to provide the community with better quality video's, photo's for terrain inspiration. Let us set up better lighting to be able to provide more tutorials and possibly a more frequent live stream! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please if you can or cannot contribute please help us by spreading the world about this campaign. 

Thank you and happy wargaming!

story:
Short Summary

We are the local Kappa Sigma chapter in Greenville, PA. We were founded 1996, which is when we started this fundraising event. Every year, we spend 72 hours riding a 10-foot long See-Saw raising money for a local cancer patient. In the past 5 years, we've raised close to $13,000 for these patients treatments. By contributing to our cause, you will be helping us to pay for these expensive treatments for our recipients.This year, we have selected an 8 year old leukemia patient at Akron hospital as the beneficiary of our annual See-saw-athon.

We're hoping to raise as much money as we possibly can for this patient. These patients are going through so much more than any of us could ever imagine, and we need to help them. Whatever money we collect will go straight to this patient. We hope to cover as much of their treatment payments as possible. 

As a local fraternity chapter, we do everything we can to help the community. This is just one of the many service projects we do throughout the year to contribute to the community. By donating to this See-Saw-a-thon, you are helping to make someone's life just a little bit easier.

If you are unable to donate to this fundraiser, please spread the word to anyone you can. This patient can use as much support as possible, and that's what we are trying to do. Please spread the word to whoever would like to donate. We appreciate you support.

story:
Just over a year ago now, the readers of Wings Over Scotland quietly revolutionised the independence campaign. When we launched the first ever formal public fundraising appeal for a Scottish political website (indeed, as far as we know the first for a politics site anywhere in Britain), your response was incredible.

Our £30,000 target was smashed, enabling the site to become a full-time professional concern, and others followed in our footsteps. By our reckoning around £150,000 was raised in 2013 for various pro-independence sites and projects, including the Common Weal and "Scotland Yet", a full-length documentary currently being produced by Jack Foster and Christopher Silver, makers of "The Fear Factor".

Now it's time to finish the job.

We pledged last year that in return for your money and your trust we'd devote ourselves to the site, give you more articles and bring the facts and arguments about independence to a wider audience. We like to think we've delivered.


MONTHLY READERSHIP

Jan 2013: 29,769
Feb 2014: 233,296

MONTHLY PAGEVIEWS

Jan 2013: 755,406
Feb 2014: 3,647,300

POSTS PUBLISHED

Year to Feb 2013: 632
Year to Feb 2014: 1,211


In the last 12 months Wings Over Scotland has been visited by 959,086 unique readers - almost a quarter of the entire Scottish electorate. And as our properly-researched, fully-sourced information and arguments have reached more and more of the people of Scotland, so the gap in the opinion polls has closed.

(Not that we're taking all the credit for that, of course, but a recent poll for STV found that this website is the single most-relied-on named source for independence facts in Scotland, so it seems fair to say we've done our bit.)

It would seem a shame to stop now. But we've spent all of last year's money, so it's time for us to ask you to put your hands in your pockets again.

This year's target is an ambitious £50,000. That's a lot of cash, but then there's a lot to do. Here's what we want it for:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. SALARY

Keen readers will have noticed that as editor I usually put in around 16 hours a day, seven days a week, 52 weeks a year - from reading and tweeting interesting stories from the papers around 6-7am to throwing things at the TV screen during Newsnight Scotland at 11pm.

But I do pop out to the shops sometimes and I don't want to play the martyr, so let's only call half of that work time - that's 50 hours a week. The UK living wage is £7.65 an hour, which comes to £19,890 a year. It's not a fortune (it's nearly £7000 less than the UK average) but it'll keep the lights on at Wings HQ.

(Why a full year with only seven months to the referendum? Because we're not hypothesising on defeat - if and when we win the subsequent negotiations will be every bit as important as the campaign, so we plan to be watching the politicians and media just as closely as we do now.)

2. RUNNING COSTS

We've been a victim of our own success - our webhosting costs, for example, recently jumped by over 600% to cope with our rocketing traffic figures.

We're just finalising the move across to a new seriously-upgraded server which should cope better, and also reduce the security measures we've had to adopt to cope with a malicious and ongoing attack aimed at taking the site down. We're budgeting £3000 for hosting and other expenses.

3. PROJECT BLUE

The thing we want to do more than anything else this year is The Wee Blue Book. This will be a printed pocket-sized booklet, 32 or 48 pages in total, containing the most concise and accessible summaries of all the key issues about independence that we can muster, dealing with all of the No campaign's scare stories and putting the facts right at people's fingertips, ready to refer to wherever you may be.

We think printed material is vital, because you can only reach so many people on the internet. It won't be cheap. We'll write the words, but we'll need a professional to design it and lay it out and then we'll have to print thousands of copies and distribute them across Scotland. We tentatively reckon £15,000 will do it.

4. MORE POLLS

Our Panelbase opinion polls - crowdfunded separately last year - have played a significant part in the debate, generating significant amounts of media coverage and bringing many new readers to the site. We've got a little bit of money still left in the polling fund, but we'd like to top it up and do at least two more between now and September. That'll take around £8000.

5. A LITTLE HELP

We've carried posts by around 50 different authors. Many contribute regularly, like Scott Minto's invaluable in-depth features and Chris Cairns' brilliant weekly cartoons. These take hours or even days of work, and people deserve to be paid.

We also haven't had a day off in the last 18 months, and it'd be nice to be able to commission a few pieces to cover a weekend break once in a blue moon. Can we find a modest £4000 for all of those things?

6. THE MIDDLE MAN

Indiegogo make running a fundraiser like this easy and straightforward both for us and people who want to donate. Very reasonably they take a small cut for that service, which means that to actually get £50,000 we have to take in another £3000 on top.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

And just like that, there's £53,000. Ooft. It's a lot of money - more than anyone has asked for or achieved before - but we think that the breakdown above is offering pretty good value for it, and we hope you'll agree.

Should we be lucky enough to exceed it, we've got a whole raft of what in the fundraising business are called "stretch goals" - other projects we'd like to do:

- We'd like to produce more printed materials, perhaps including a paper edition of The Sealand Gazette.

- We really want to do some live events, such as Q&A sessions for undecided voters in locations around Scotland. Those will cost money to hire venues and equipment, produce flyers for and so on.

- Undertaking some promotional work - readers have suggested hiring billboards in railway stations to bring more people to the site, for example. They're not as expensive as you might think.

But let's not get ahead of ourselves - we can worry about those if we get past the initial goal, and that's a big enough ask to be going on with for now.

There are a lot of you out there, but times are hard and not everyone can spare money. If you can't, don't fret about it, and definitely don't send us anything you can't really afford - there are plenty of other ways you can help out, by tweeting and sharing links and telling people about the site. We'd be nothing without all the people who've spread the word in the last 12 months.

But if you've got a couple of quid burning a hole in your pocket, and a desire for independence burning in your heart, we reckon you could do worse than send a wee something our way. We'll make good use of it, we promise.
story_txt: Just over a year ago now, the readers of Wings Over Scotland quietly revolutionised the independence campaign. When we launched the first ever formal public fundraising appeal for a Scottish political website (indeed, as far as we know the first for a politics site anywhere in Britain), your response was incredible.Our £30,000 target was smashed, enabling the site to become a full-time professional concern, and others followed in our footsteps. By our reckoning around £150,000 was raised in 2013 for various pro-independence sites and projects, including the Common Weal and "Scotland Yet", a full-length documentary currently being produced by Jack Foster and Christopher Silver, makers of "The Fear Factor".Now it's time to finish the job.We pledged last year that in return for your money and your trust we'd devote ourselves to the site, give you more articles and bring the facts and arguments about independence to a wider audience. We like to think we've delivered.MONTHLY READERSHIPJan 2013: 29,769Feb 2014: 233,296MONTHLY PAGEVIEWSJan 2013: 755,406Feb 2014: 3,647,300POSTS PUBLISHEDYear to Feb 2013: 632Year to Feb 2014: 1,211In the last 12 months Wings Over Scotland has been visited by 959,086 unique readers - almost a quarter of the entire Scottish electorate. story:
You asked for it and now we are going to build a tasting room - but we need your help - fundraiser!

Yeah, right. Ron and Laurie have been saying for years how they wanted to open a tasting room at the brewery.  So of these are crazy as we give you back 3x the amount of your donation but we want this to be special!

Surely a tap room at the old original brewery in the heart of downtown Dexter simply has to be next!

What? What do you mean you’ve been selling more and more sour beer, until the entire original brewery is so full of barrels that you can only cross from one end to the other by walking across the tops of barrels? You say there is no room for a nice cozy tap room, and with sales still climbing you need to build a larger brewery! Unfair.

So now, with the new brewery built, you expect me to believe you are finally going to put in a tap room?

Well, color me crazy, but I’ve believed in Jolly Pumpkin since that first sour barrel and yes, I believe they WILL build it.

Yes, it's true, we're finally going to build it, and we'd like your help. You've helped us grow and spread the word on our weird award winning wares, and now you can help us build this taproom!

Here’s some ways you can.

story:
This campaign is now closed - thank you everybody who contributed in any way. 


I'm still taking donations - if you head to the blog you'll find a Donate button in the sidebar on the right.


This is partly a performance, partly a writing and film-making project.


For those of you who don't know me already this might sound a bit odd.  If you want to find out more about what I do, take a look at this post about my art from my friend Francesca Elston. Also it's definitely *not* about funding a holiday :)


“Please Look After This Englishman” will involve me travelling coast-to-coast across the USA making use of my online social network to provide practical help as well as deciding which way to go, how to get there and where to stay along the way.


In a nutshell I will turn up somewhere on the West Coast on March 1st and somehow make my way across via the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas to fly home from the East Coast on March 31st.


This follows on from last year's successful Tuttle2Texas on which I learned that the most exciting and interesting things happened when I gave up the myth of control over the trip and was willing to ask people in my online social network for specific help.


The trip is designed to test the hypothesis that “The true return on investment in social media is social capital” and to explore ways of measuring the use and accumulation of that capital. As an example of how I'll be looking at this, consider that I've been actively building an online social network for many years. If I didn't have that, then what would it cost me to do a trip like this? And what opportunities will I get from knowing someone in most towns that I visit, from being passed on from person to person, instead of making my own way to a predefined itinerary?


I'm particularly interested in what happens when I give up control of the trip and actively ask for help.


I will of course be creating a multimedia blog about the experience as the journey progresses. I will also be using all the usual social tools, Twitter, Flickr, YouTube, Facebook to keep making new connections and giving something back to the people who help me out. I also expect to publish a book based on the trip and to make a short film out of the video footage that I'll be routinely shooting.


Why I'm raising money.

The trip is a balancing act between simply paying for everything directly and giving people in my network the opportunity to help out. I'm raising money for contingency, to cover my overhead while I'm away and for kit and some travel (which may be provided as sponsorship in kind rather than cash). At the top end, I'd like to employ someone back in the UK to cover content editorial and promotion for the duration of the trip.


Other Ways You Can Help


There are four other ways you can get involved:


Just watching

gasping with amazement, pointing and laughing, making suggestions for next right steps – for now keep an eye on http://t2t2.posterous.com


Spreading the word

if you can do nothing else, *please* just tell some other people about this weird English guy, what he's doing and where they can find me if they want to take part.  Follow me on twitter.


Encouraging larger-scale sponsorship & patronage

I don't want to throw money at this, but equally I don't want to freeload the whole way – I also have expenses back in the UK to cover while I'm away. If people give me money or other help, I want to provide them with some value in exchange. This might range from me giving you the benefit of my brainpower and facilitation skills, through me entertaining and inspiring your staff with my tales from the road and a spot of ukulele fun, all the way to me wearing your logo on my t-shirt and evangelising your product wherever I go. However, if you'd like to make a donation to make sure that this thing can happen, because you just want more stuff like this in the world, that works for me too.


Lending a hand directly

I will need people to stay with, to drive me long distances, to feed me or at least eat with me, to show me around, to introduce me to interesting people and places, to smile at me and tell me I'm nuts but that's OK and all manner of other things that I can't imagine or am embarrassed (in my adorable, but infuriating, British way) to ask for.

story:
What makes a U.S. Marine special?  A Marine is always faithful they live by their motto “Semper Fidelis” which means “always faithful.”  Our  company Patriot Beverage , has created a new energy drink called “RE-UP” with partial proceeds to benefit the Semper Fi Fund and Americas Fund which provides assistance to all injured service members both seen and unseen injuries.

 

As a former Marine, it was ingrained into our mindset that you live and work by the Marine Code of Honor, Courage and Commitment. 

 

When I decided to create an energy drink I wanted to create something special that was healthier and better tasting than the other drinks on the market.  So we spent several years developing the formula.  After numerous attempts we were able to create a drink that both tasted great and was healthy.  RE-UP has less caffeine than other similar drinks and more vitamins which provided the results of alertness without the crash effect. We then went a step further and replaced the sodium which is in most other energy drinks with potassium.  Other healthy ingredients include thiamin, riboflavin, niacin, vitamin B-12, and folate acid. There is also a sugar free version of Re-Up.  Our belief that this is a more healthful alternative was affirmed when our drink was approved by the US Navy Chief Flight surgeon after comparing to other leading energy drinks.

 

So following the Marine Code we want to honor the brave Men and Women of our armed services  with a healthy and tasty energy drink, but to also show our real commitment to our service members we have pledged to give a percentage of our sales to the Semper Fi fund and Americas Fund to assist injured Armed Service members with seen and unseen injuries.  We have already started contributing from our early sales to these organizations which has already helped some members of the United States Marine Corps.

 

It takes courage and dedication to take on the major energy drink companies and become a successful brand.  To help push us towards that goal of being a true competitor Patriot Beverage Company has the exclusive rights to the use the Marine Corps logo in the energy drink category.

 

We have committed to making Patriot Beverage Company a successful venture that is good for our customers and gives back to the community through our ongoing service, including creating jobs here in the United States.

 

Here is an example of the growth that our product has taken. The Marine Corps gave us a 90 day test on one of their Westcoast bases.  We started ranked at 179  in sales in the energy beverages category sold on base, by the end of the test period we had increased our base market share to 23rd.  As a result, we were allowed to expand to 9 other marine bases, including our most recent addition the US Marine Training Depot in San Diego, California. 

 

We are trying to raise $50,000 to allow us to start selling to all other bases throughout the world for all branches of service.  This is a tremendous opportunity for us and we have the courage and dedication to make it happen.  We would appreciate your assistance in helping our small American based company succeed in this venture.  Help us provide our fighting men and women a healthy alternative energy drink and provide additional funding to help wounded veterans.

 

Once we have started selling to all of the Marine bases we intend to grow Re-up into the retail marketplace and those people pledging more than $50 will be among the first civilians to have the opportunity to help us break into the mainstream marketplace.
